title: Person Of Interest - Secrets (Sneak Peek)
author: Novus Destiny
comment:
"I have feeling for you, John"
"Oh."
Great job Mr. Reese! Really got that response down!

In my opinion this is the most happy's, and the scariest scene ever. Happy for John, scary for Iris. Zoe says it all in episode 19 same season, Its not you I'm worried about. You know how this ends "John".
This was back when he thought he could possibly have a life.

"So ur not afraid of me?"

Best
description:
SPOILER ! Intense scene between John & Iris.
Skip 4x18
